description: Two bedroom, one bathroom first floor, newly renovated apartment with open floor plan located close to the intersection of Perryville Rd and Lexington on the north side of Cape Girardeau.  Fresh paint and new brushed nickel ceiling fans and light fixtures throughout the apartment.  New colonial pecan ceramic tile flooring for easy care in kitchen, dining room, living room, and bathroom.  Modern kitchen has all new cabinets and counter top, and new tile backsplash.  Bathroom has new cabinet, counter top, and sink. Enjoy central A/C, baseboard heat, covered parking, and coin operated washer & dryer located on the first floor of the building.   In the Alma Schrader district. Minimum Deposit $625.00.
